constraints.name: range_inclusion
constraints.description: 每个乘客的起点和终点必须在所选公交车的行驶范围内

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: 乘客到达车站的时间必须早于或等于所选公交车的出发时间

constraints.name: min_time_selection
constraints.description: 每个乘客选择最早满足条件的公交车
constraints.formal: min(t_j) 使得 s_j ≤ l_i 且 r_i ≤ f_j 且 b_i ≤ t_j
